Class oracle.html.Embed 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index  OWS Table of Contents

Class oracle.html.Embed 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Embed
public class Embed
extends Object
implements IHtmlItem
Description:

Embed encapsulates an Embed element. This allows insertion of arbitrary (e.g. multimedia) objects directly into an HTML page.

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to insert a multimedia object into your HTML page.

Example: 

// Create a new Embed object with the following attributes:
// Embed src file name:  "Myavi.avi"
// Width of Embed Window:  300
// Height of Embed Window:  200
// Parameter:   AUTOSTART = TRUE, LOOP = TRUE
Embed embed = new Embed("Myavi.avi", 300, 200);
embed.addParam("AUTOSTART", "TRUE");
embed.addParam("LOOP", "TRUE");

See Also:
IHtmlItem

Sets the number of pixels of height of the Embed window
